title: EV industry in India is not relevant without incentives: Bernstein
description: Automakers face challenges in achieving profitability and scale in the electric vehicle (EV) sector, despite financial incentives, according to a research report by Bernstein. Traditional manufacturers are struggling, with only a few expected to remain competitive. Startups may survive but with limited market share. Government incentives remain crucial for the EV industry's competitiveness.
